ygData.subject: RE: Keys on Slaver
ygData.msgSnippet: NO! Do NOT free my slaves. Why do you think I put them there? They serve Innoruuk well, don t you think? Instead, KILL them and raise your faction with Neriak
ygData.messageBody:
NO! Do NOT free my slaves. Why do you think I put them there? They serve
Innoruuk well, don't you think? Instead, KILL them and raise your faction
with Neriak and come live with us! It is a much better city then that uppity
Felwithe place...and I won't even talk about Kelethin (tree huggers ;))

Drizben D'vorn
Defiled Priest of Innoruuk
Crushbone Slave Killer


> From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
>
> The keys are to unlock the slaves in CrushBone. The key should have a
> number on it and if you give the slaves a copper piece they'll tell you
> their number. So once you find the slave with the number of that key you
> can set him/her free.
>
> **************************
> Azor Spellbound
> Lvl 20 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> **************************
>
>
> > From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
> >
> > I was in CrushBone the other day and got a Key of the slaver (or was it
> the
> > prophet?)
> >
> > Anyone know what its for? Thanks.
> >
> > Chas
>
>
